:::config { "language": "javascript", "theme": "material-theme-palenight" }
CustomRenderer.prototype.matchedRangeModifier = function (content, prefix = '') {
    let pattern = new RegExp(escapeRegex(prefix) + ':?((start|end|all|-?[0-9]+)(,-?[0-9]+)?)?', 'i');

    return content.match(pattern);
}
:::expectation
<pre><code data-theme='material-theme-palenight' data-lang='javascript' class='phiki language-javascript material-theme-palenight torchlight' style='background-color: #292D3E;color: #A6ACCD;--theme-selection-background: #00000080'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #FFCB6B;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #82AAFF;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #C792EA;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">{</span><span class="token">

:::end
<pre><code data-theme='material-theme-palenight' data-lang='javascript' class='phiki language-javascript material-theme-palenight torchlight' style='background-color: #292D3E;color: #A6ACCD;--theme-selection-background: #00000080'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #3A3F58; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #FFCB6B;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #82AAFF;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #C792EA;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #A6ACCD;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #89DDFF;">{</span><span class="token">
